name: Simulate template matches overlapping legacy and composable templates

headers.warning: 299 Elasticsearch-9.0.0-1b4f5eb36d06bd0ef8f517b4f8653e5dc253ecd7 "index template [v2_template] has index patterns [test*] matching patterns from existing older templates [v1_template] with patterns (v1_template => [test*, t1*]); this template [v2_template] will take precedence during new index creation"
